      • queueFull

        public boolean queueFull()
        Description copied from interface: Feeder
        Indicates whether the feed queue is full. Depending on the feeder implementation, this method may be used to check whether the feed queue is full prior to feeding additional data to a network.
        Specified by:
        queueFull in interface Feeder<StreamFeeder>
        Overrides:
        queueFull in class AbstractFeeder<StreamFeeder>
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the feed queue is full.

      • drainHandler

        public StreamFeeder drainHandler(org.vertx.java.core.Handler<Void> handler)
        Description copied from interface: StreamFeeder
        Sets a drain handler on the feeder. The drain handler will be called when the feed queue is available to receive new messages.
        Specified by:
        drainHandler in interface StreamFeeder
        Parameters:
        handler - A handler to be invoked when a full feed queue is emptied.
        Returns:
        The called feeder instance.
